title: ZOMBI (MULTI9) [FitGirl Repack, 100% Lossless] 3.99 GB
description:
::Information::


Release Date: August 18, 2015
Genres/Tags: Action, Survival, First-person, 3D, Horror, Zombies
Developer: Ubisoft Montpellier
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: LyN
Steam User Rating: 73% of user reviews are positive (based on 332 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian
Audio Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian
Crack: built-in (CODEX)


::Repack Features::


Based on ZOMBI-CODEX ISO release: codex-zombi.iso (21,390,327,808 bytes)
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 20 to 4 GB)
Installation takes: ~30 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~45 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~70 minutes on 2-cores CPU
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 21 GB (~28 GB during intallation)
GUI & audio be changed in game settings separately
Repack by FitGirl
